item.title: Distributed Event Store with NATS-Streaming
item.description: Distributed Event Store with NATS-Streaming This is my first post on medium. I'm going to talk about my hands-on experience while implementing a distributed event store. The goal was to implement event sourcing from scratch and offloading reliable message delivery to NATS. https://medium.com/@deusdustin/distributed-event-store-with-nats-streaming-43981cb19fe0
